医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究强调了拉丁美洲社区围产期妇女面临的 COVID-19 挑战在 COVID-19 大流行期间，公共政策阻止许多居住在美国的墨西哥裔家庭获得食品和心理保健等重要服务，尽管这些社区的感染率和死亡率最高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/Study-highlights-COVID-19-challenges-for-perinatal-women-in-Latino-communities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/Study-highlights-COVID-19-challenges-for-perinatal-women-in-Latino-communities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=27694f91-4af1-4cdc-a4ec-1ebf74234509 Fri, 05 Apr 2024 00:00:00 -0400 Study highlights COVID-19 challenges for perinatal women in Latino communities
新型放射治疗系统对卵巢癌的无创检测和治疗根据《核医学杂志》四月号上发表的新研究，一种新的放射治疗系统能够无创地检测和治疗卵巢癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/Non-guarantee-detection-and-treatment-of-ovarian-cancer-with-new-radiotheranostic-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/Non-guarantee-detection-and-treatment-of-ovarian-cancer-with-new-radiotheranostic-system.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=040e50ff-7439-4937-b9c2-351cde04caac Thu, 04 Apr 2024 23:49:27 -0400 Non-invasive detection and treatment of ovarian cancer with new radiotheranostic system
研究表明，哮喘发作不仅会导致炎症，还会造成气道损伤研究人员报告说，在哮喘中，支气管周围的肌肉收紧会挤压和破坏上皮细胞，从而导致气道受损，从而促进气道炎症和粘液产生，这通常与哮喘发作有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/Asthma-attacks-cause-airway-damage-beyond-inflammation-research-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/Asthma-attacks-cause-airway-damage-beyond-inflammation-research-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=66ea57eb-aa6e-44db-8352-00366cd0448c Thu, 04 Apr 2024 23:44:41 -0400 Asthma attacks cause airway damage beyond inflammation, research shows
高血压与中年患者患痴呆症的风险较高有关研究利用 CAIDE 评分对阿根廷白人高血压患者队列进行痴呆风险预测，调查了中年人高血压与患痴呆风险增加之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/Hypertension-linked-to-higher-dementia-risk-in-middle-ages- Patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/Hypertension-linked-to-higher-dementia-risk-in-middle-ages- Patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=884a90a6-2a99-40d5-83bf-1be82a18fe62 Thu, 04 Apr 2024 23:40:00 -0400 Hypertension linked to higher dementia risk in middle-aged patients
解开脑细胞中长寿 RNA 的秘密在美国生活二十年后，Martin Hetzer 于 2023 年返回奥地利，成为奥地利科学技术研究所 (ISTA) 第二任院长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/Unlocking-the-secrets-of-long-lived-RNAs-in-brain-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/Unlocking-the-secrets-of-long-lived-RNAs-in-brain-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7ca791a-5f73-4b4c-820b-75ece5abe423 Thu, 04 Apr 2024 23:39:07 -0400 Unlocking the secrets of long-lived RNAs in brain cells
梅奥诊所与寺崎研究所宣布合作研究以改善器官移植结果梅奥诊所和寺崎生物医学创新研究所今天宣布开展一项以改善器官移植结果为中心的研究合作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/Mayo-Clinic-Terasaki-Institute-announce-research-collaboration-for-improving-organ-transplant-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/Mayo-Clinic-Terasaki-Institute-announce-research-collaboration-for-improving-organ-transplant-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9206c78c-a6f5-4e91-a9f8-4321a6c0de34 Thu, 04 Apr 2024 23:16:32 -0400 Mayo Clinic, Terasaki Institute announce research collaboration for improving organ transplant outcomes
基于血液的 DNA 测试使膀胱癌患者免于不必要的治疗新的研究表明，血液中的肿瘤 DNA 检测可以成功识别手术后不会复发的晚期膀胱癌患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/Blood-based-DNA-test-spares-bladder-cancer-病人-from-unnecessary-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/Blood-based-DNA-test-spares-bladder-cancer-病人-from-unnecessary-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=63288163-1ba6-4a6a-a130-6ebbd0e01dfb Thu, 04 Apr 2024 23:13:14 -0400 Blood-based DNA test spares bladder cancer patients from unnecessary treatments
柳叶刀委员会预测全球前列腺癌病例急剧增加据《柳叶刀》前列腺癌委员会称，到 2040 年，前列腺癌病例预计将从 2020 年的每年 140 万例增加一倍，达到每年 290 万例，其中低收入和中等收入国家 (LMIC) 的病例增幅预计最高该研究将在欧洲泌尿外科协会大会上的演讲中推出。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/Lancet-Commission-predicts-sharp-increase-in-global-prostate-cancer-cases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/Lancet-Commission-predicts-sharp-increase-in-global-prostate-cancer-cases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2112311f-1c12-491c-81a0-f2b101be6ead Thu, 04 Apr 2024 23:09:22 -0400 Lancet Commission predicts sharp increase in global prostate cancer cases
无家可归者社区附近的洪水中发现新的 SARS-CoV-2 突变研究强调在受无家可归人群影响的防洪渠道中检测到 SARS-CoV-2 RNA 和新型尖峰基因突变，证明了环境监测在了解公共卫生动态方面的价值。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/Novel-SARS-CoV-2-mutations-found-in-floodwaters-near-homeless-communities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/Novel-SARS-CoV-2-mutations-found-in-floodwaters-near-homeless-communities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=37af5319-c647-40eb-b447-ee5b995124c6 Thu, 04 Apr 2024 23:04:00 -0400 Novel SARS-CoV-2 mutations found in floodwaters near homeless communities
基因治疗和糖苷类药物为多囊肾治疗带来新希望研究人员表明，多囊肾病 (PKD) 中随时间推移形成的危险囊肿可以通过缺陷基因的单个正常拷贝来预防。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/Gene-therapy-and-glycoside-drugs-offer-new-hope-for-polycystic-kidney-disease-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/Gene-therapy-and-glycoside-drugs-offer-new-hope-for-polycystic-kidney-disease-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f9757a42-b112-4cb4-b7f0-e59838d3ccca Thu, 04 Apr 2024 23:00:48 -0400 Gene therapy and glycoside drugs offer new hope for polycystic kidney disease treatment
